name: Key Puss
description:
《Key Puss》This is a creative game, you can put the character on the computer desktop, can detect the mouse, keyboard pressed, and displayed on the body of the character, the character has a physical soft system, support custom colors and poses!

Key Detection

Can detect the mouse, keyboard pressed and displayed on the body of the character, whether in the office or playing games, which can bring more fun in daily use!

Custom poses

Can customize any pose, just slide the corresponding slider in the game, you can adjust to any pose and save

Custom colors

Support for customizing any color, characters, clothes, hair, light effects all support custom colors

Physical softness

The characters have physical softness effect, using excellent physical softness system, greatly restore the real softness effect

Reminder function

Different times of the day to remind players of things in their lives, such as eating and sleeping, or to customize reminders and enter text

Game Features

A Cute 3D Girl

Supports Key Detection
Custom poses
Custom colors
Physical softness effect
Reminder function
